thread.section_title: Premier Inn London Hendon (The Hyde) Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Strongly recommended for families
thread.title_full: Strongly recommended for families - Review of Premier Inn London Hendon (The Hyde) Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Arkadiusz K
title: Strongly recommended for families
text: Very good hotel, close to the public transport, helpful stuff and extremely comfortable bed. If you are looking for acceptable price accommodation, this hotel is recommended. I spent here 3 nights with my family and all of us were very happy.
